site_description: Software that embodies democratic values creates more democratic organizations
header_tagline: Software that embodies democratic values creates more democratic organizations
header_meta: A Living Manifesto • Version 1.0 • Open Source
footer_living_manifesto: This manifesto is itself a work in progress, meant to be forked, improved, and adapted by communities around the world. Like democracy itself, it is never finished—only continuously practiced.
